ygData.subject: Re: Hot Key to Re-target Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: Snip ... Windleaf, How did you get this to your del key?  I know how to remap keys - I actually have remapped all my movement keys, reply, tells, etc. to my
ygData.messageBody:
Snip
> I've remapped the following:
>
> "target pet" => "del" on keypad


Windleaf,

How did you get this to your del key? I know how to remap keys - I
actually have remapped all my movement keys, reply, tells, etc. to
my left hand normal typing home position leaving the right hand for
the mouse. But, each of those remappings were specifically available
in the keyboard options. Did you somehow get /target pet to your
user defined keys? Then assign that user defined key to del? (and is
the command /target pet or /pet target?)

I guess my real question is how to use the user defined key. How do
you define the action and then assign to a key stroke?

Thanks,

Piemur Draggonsinger
The Nameless
Bard of the 30th Song
